import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search project sources"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1/projects/{slug}/search/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Search for relevant sources within a project using AI-powered semantic search.

**Required permission:** `project_search`

**Access rules:**
- Public projects: No authentication required
- Private projects: Requires API key with `project_search` permission


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"slug","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Project slug identifier"},{"in":"query","name":"q","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":true,"description":"Search query"},{"in":"query","name":"url","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":false,"description":"URL from where the search was initiated."},{"in":"query","name":"filter_title","schema":{"type":"string"},"required":false,"description":"Optional filter to restrict search results to documents matching this filter title."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

export const searchResultItems = {"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string","description":"The page title related to the document."},"fragment":{"type":"string","description":"A snippet of text containing the search query or a relevant section of the document."},"url":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The URL to the original document containing the fragment."},"score":{"type":"integer","description":"Relevance score."},"domain":{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"The root domain name of the source."},"is_title_match":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the page title contains the exact search query."}}};

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"results":{"type":"array","items":searchResultItems}}}}},"description":"Search results"},"400":{"description":"Bad request - missing query parameter"},"403":{"description":"Forbidden"},"404":{"description":"Project not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
